Description: o Traveling to patients’ homes and managing their care plans according to physicians’ instructions.o Administering medication and insulin, and completing blood pressure, glucose, urine, and stool tests.o Inspecting wounds, changing dressings, and handling personal grooming and hygiene.o Collaborating with doctors and other healthcare professionals to develop improved diets and healthcare plans for patients.Skills
Skills: o Must be a BSN holder Bachelor of Science in Nursing
o With or without DHA license.
o Willing to train and work in homecare facilities.
o If DHA license holder, it's advantage. **Home health care nurse should be able to deliver skilled services like the following:
o Wound care and dressing changes
